translation: They model neurons and different areas of the brain

translation: They program mathematical models and introduce them into robots and drones

sentence: Lo han desarrollado investigadores de la Escuela de Ingeniería Industrial de la UPCT, dirigidos por Antonio Guerrero, del departamento de Ingeniería de Sistemas y Automática
translation: It has been developed by researchers from the School of Industrial Engineering of UPCT, led by Antonio Guerrero, from the Department of Systems and Automation Engineering

sentence: Imitan la capacidad de resiliencia del ser humano, es decir, la posibilidad de reconfigurarse a pesar de sufrir daños o averías sin dejar de funcionar adecuadamente, agrega el profesor
translation: "They mimic the resilience capacity of the human being, that is, the ability to reconfigure despite suffering damage or breakdowns without ceasing to function properly," adds the professor

sentence: Los trabajos han permitido desarrollar nuevos sistemas de control bioinspirados para drones submarinos y barcos autónomos
translation: The work has allowed the development of new bioinspired control systems for underwater drones and autonomous ships

sentence: La novedad es que son capaces de esquivar  obstáculos durante su navegación
translation: The novelty is that they are able to dodge obstacles during their navigation

sentence: Modifican su trayectoria, al igual que hace una persona cuando se encuentra un objeto
translation: They modify their trajectory, just like a person does when encountering an object

sentence: Estos avances se está aplicando ya a la robótica marina

sentence: Permitirá adaptar los robots a las adversidades del mar, como lo hacen los animales acuáticos, explica el Guerrero
translation: It will allow robots to adapt to the adversities of the sea, as aquatic animals do," explains Guerrero

sentence: Los ensayos de los drones y los barcos se han realizado en el Mar Menor y en litoral próximo a la bahía de Cartagena
translation: Tests of drones and ships have been carried out in the Mar Menor and near the coast of the bay of Cartagena

sentence: Por otro lado, los investigadores han desarrollado algoritmos totalmente bioinspirados que sirven para la navegación de drones y robots autónomos
translation: On the other hand, the researchers have developed completely bioinspired algorithms that are used for the navigation of drones and autonomous robots

sentence: Los modelos representan el córtex motor del cerebro, es decir, las áreas que sirven para hacer los movimientos espaciales
translation: The models represent the motor cortex of the brain, that is, the areas that serve to make spatial movements

sentence: Estos trabajos se enmarcan en la tesis internacional del profesor Francisco García Córdova, dirigida por los profesores Antonio Guerrero y Toribio Fernández
translation: These works are part of the international thesis of Professor Francisco García Córdova, supervised by Professors Antonio Guerrero and Toribio Fernández

sentence: La tesis doctoral, titulada Bio-inspired neural control algorithms for applications in biomimetic robotics, defendida este mes, ha recibido la máxima calificación: Sobresaliente Cum Laude
translation: The doctoral thesis, entitled "Bio-inspired neural control algorithms for applications in biomimetic robotics", defended this month, has received the highest qualification: Outstanding Cum Laude
